doc.after: The file mover user right allows users experienced in working with files to rename them subject to policy with the ease that autoconfirmed users already enjoy when renaming Wikipedia articles  Any administrator can grant this right at their discretion to trusted users who regularly work with media files and have demonstrated familiarity with Wikipedia s policies and guidelines surrounding renaming this type of media There is no set requirement but users should be well versed in Wikipedia s image and media policies specifically the renaming guidelines given in this document have experience with images and how the rename process works Experience with the equivalent tool at Commons and other relevant experience with media files may be taken into account
